scenario: You want to start working out.
user_instruction: Rewrite the prompt to say your goal, your level, and what equipment you have.
gold_prompt: Create a 4-week beginner workout plan for getting fit using only dumbbells. I can exercise 3 days a week for 30 minutes. Include a checklist to track my progress.
common_mistakes: Not saying how long the plan should be
hint: Be specific about your goal and what you have to work with.

scenario: You need a creative story for class.
user_instruction: Improve the prompt by adding details about the story's style, length, and ending.
gold_prompt: Write a funny 500-word sci-fi story about a robot who wants to be a chef. End with a surprise twist where the robot invents a new flavor. Keep it fun!
common_mistakes: Asking for a story without a style or mood
Forgetting to say how long it should be
Not asking for a specific ending
hint: Describe what a 'winning' story looks like.

scenario: You're planning a trip with friends.
user_instruction: Make it clearer by adding where you're going, your budget, and how many people.
gold_prompt: Plan a 2-day hiking trip for 4 friends near Denver. Budget is $200 per person. List the trails and where we should stay.
common_mistakes: Forgetting how many people are going
hint: Give details so the AI doesn't have to guess.

scenario: You have leftover food and want dinner ideas.
user_instruction: Rewrite to list your ingredients and what kind of meal you want.
gold_prompt: Suggest 3 easy dinner recipes using chicken, broccoli, and rice. I have 30 minutes. Tell me how long each takes.
common_mistakes: Not listing what food you have
Not saying what meal (breakfast, dinner, etc.)
Not saying how much time you have
hint: Tell the AI exactly what you're working with.

scenario: You want to organize your messy closet.
user_instruction: Add details on how you want things sorted.
gold_prompt: Create a guide to organizing a small closet. Sort clothes by season and color. Include a supply checklist like bins and hangers.
common_mistakes: Asking for help without saying the goal
Not saying how to organize (by color, etc.)
hint: Describe how the closet should look when you're done.

scenario: You want to learn guitar.
user_instruction: Be clear about your skill level, music style, and practice time.
gold_prompt: Create a 1-month practice schedule for a beginner learning acoustic guitar. Focus on basic chords for pop songs. I can practice 20 minutes a day.
common_mistakes: Not saying what kind of guitar
Forgetting to mention you're a beginner
Not saying how long the plan should be
hint: Be specific about time and skill level.

scenario: You need to return something broken.
user_instruction: Include what you bought, what's wrong with it, and what you want.
gold_prompt: Write a polite email asking for a refund for broken headphones (Order #12345). Explain that one side stopped working. Ask for return instructions.
common_mistakes: Not saying if you should be polite or direct
hint: Give all the facts needed to help you.

scenario: You need a gift idea for someone.
user_instruction: Add your budget and what they're into.
gold_prompt: Suggest 5 unique gift ideas for someone who loves gaming, under $50. Don't suggest gift cards. Say why each one is cool.
common_mistakes: Asking for ideas without a price limit
Not saying what NOT to buy
hint: Set limits to get better ideas.

scenario: You need to write a thank-you note.
user_instruction: Add who the note is for and what you're thanking them for.
gold_prompt: Write a warm thank-you note to my grandma for the sweater she made for my birthday. Mention that I love the blue color.
hint: The AI needs to know who and what.

scenario: You want to explain a game to someone.
user_instruction: Add the name of the game and who you're explaining it to.
gold_prompt: Explain the rules of 'Capture the Flag' to kids who have never played. Focus on how to win and staying safe.
common_mistakes: Assuming the AI knows the game
hint: Say the game name and the audience.

scenario: Your plant looks sick.
user_instruction: Ask the AI to ask YOU questions to figure out the problem.
gold_prompt: My indoor plant is turning yellow. Ask me 3 questions about water and sunlight to help find the problem.
common_mistakes: Asking for a fix without describing the problem
Not asking the AI to ask questions
Not saying what kind of plant
hint: Let the AI interview you.

scenario: You need a study plan.
user_instruction: Add the subject, what to cover, and how much time you have.
gold_prompt: Create a 3-day study schedule for Biology. I need to cover chapters 5 through 9. I have 4 hours each day.
common_mistakes: Not saying how much to study
hint: Subject + Amount + Time.

scenario: You want feedback on a design.
user_instruction: Use clear words instead of vague ones.
gold_prompt: Check this poster design. Focus on making the title stand out more from the background so it's easier to read.
common_mistakes: Using slang like 'make it pop' without explaining
Not saying what part to change
hint: Use clear words instead of slang.

scenario: You want a pet recommendation.
user_instruction: Tell the AI to ask you about your life before suggesting anything.
gold_prompt: I want a pet that fits my life. Ask me 5 questions about my home and schedule to help me choose.
common_mistakes: Asking for a pet without giving info
hint: Make the AI ask you for details first.

scenario: You need a social media caption.
user_instruction: Add details about the photo and where you'll post it.
gold_prompt: Write a fun Instagram caption for a photo of my dog playing in the snow. Add some winter emojis!
common_mistakes: Forgetting to say what's in the photo
hint: Describe the photo.

scenario: You want a sports rule explained.
user_instruction: Say which rule and which sport.
gold_prompt: Explain the 'offside' rule in soccer to someone who's never watched. Use a simple example.
common_mistakes: Assuming the AI knows the sport
Asking about a rule without naming it
Not saying how simple it should be
hint: Name the rule and the sport.

scenario: You need a meal plan with food restrictions.
user_instruction: Add rules for vegetarian and nut-free.
gold_prompt: Create a 7-day dinner menu that's vegetarian and nut-free. Use ingredients that are easy to find.
common_mistakes: Forgetting one of the diet rules
hint: Diet rules are super important.

scenario: You need a party playlist.
user_instruction: Set rules: upbeat music only, no slow songs, no bad words.
gold_prompt: Make a 3-hour party playlist. Songs must be happy and upbeat. No slow songs or songs with bad language.
common_mistakes: Asking for a playlist without a style
hint: Tell the AI what to avoid.

scenario: You need to schedule a group meeting.
user_instruction: Rule out the days that don't work.
gold_prompt: Find 3 times for a 1-hour group meeting next week. It can't be Tuesday or Thursday. Monday and Wednesday work.
common_mistakes: Not saying how long the meeting is
Picking a day that doesn't work
hint: Rule out the bad times clearly.

scenario: You're looking for a new laptop.
user_instruction: Add limits: price under $1000 and Windows only.
gold_prompt: Suggest 3 laptops for a student under $1000. No Macs—I only want Windows.
common_mistakes: Not saying it's for a student
hint: Price and type are important rules.

scenario: You need to write about a problem politely.
user_instruction: Be serious but polite. No rude words.
gold_prompt: Write a message about a broken item I received. Be serious but polite. Don't use angry words.
hint: You can be firm without being mean.

scenario: You need a logo idea.
user_instruction: Add rules: only 2 colors and describe it in words.
gold_prompt: Describe a simple logo for a bake sale. Use only 2 colors: pink and white. Keep it simple.
common_mistakes: Expecting a picture instead of words
hint: Limit the colors to keep it simple.

scenario: You're planning a family outing.
user_instruction: Find something that works for both kids and adults.
gold_prompt: Suggest a fun place in San Diego that has activities for kids but also stuff adults will enjoy. Not too loud!
common_mistakes: Only thinking of kids or only adults
hint: Find something everyone will like.

scenario: You think your test grade is wrong.
user_instruction: Stick to facts and examples, no feelings.
gold_prompt: Write an email asking my teacher to review my test grade. Point to the specific questions I think were marked wrong. Don't say it's unfair.
hint: Stick to the facts.

scenario: You need a shopping list for a party.
user_instruction: Ask for a checklist grouped by store section.
gold_prompt: Make a shopping list for a taco party. Group items by section like Produce, Meat, and Dairy so it's easy to shop.
common_mistakes: Not saying what the party is for
hint: Think about the store aisles.

scenario: You want to start journaling.
user_instruction: Ask for a specific template: Gratitude, Goal, Reflection.
gold_prompt: Make a journal template. Follow this order: 1. Gratitude (3 things), 2. Today's Goal, 3. Reflection.
common_mistakes: Not asking for the specific order
Not saying how many items to list
hint: Define the outline.

scenario: You're comparing cars to buy.
user_instruction: Ask for a table to compare price and features.
gold_prompt: Compare the Toyota Camry and Honda Accord. Make a table with Price, Gas Mileage, and Power.
common_mistakes: Asking for text instead of a table
Letting the AI pick the format
hint: Tables are best for comparing.

scenario: You need a contact card design.
user_instruction: Give a specific layout template.
gold_prompt:
Write text for my contact card. Use this format:
[Name] | [Title]
----------------
[Phone] | [Email]
[Website]
common_mistakes: Asking for text without a layout
hint: Show the AI exactly how it should look.

scenario: You're planning meals for the week.
user_instruction: Ask for headers for Breakfast, Lunch, and Dinner.
gold_prompt: Create a 3-day meal plan. Use headers for 'Breakfast', 'Lunch', and 'Dinner' for each day. Include calories.
common_mistakes: Accepting a big block of text
hint: Headers make it easy to read.

scenario: You need instructions for a pet sitter.
user_instruction: Ask for a numbered list in time order.
gold_prompt: Write instructions for my cat sitter. Make a numbered list: Morning, Afternoon, Evening.
hint: Lists are easier to follow.

scenario: You're making a list of your books.
user_instruction: Ask for a CSV format with Title and Author.
gold_prompt: Make a CSV list of 3 books. Use these headers: Title, Author, Year, Genre.
common_mistakes: Asking for a list without the right format
hint: CSV is a computer-friendly format.

scenario: You lost your phone.
user_instruction: Ask for a flyer with clear sections.
gold_prompt: Write a 'Lost Phone' flyer. Include 4 sections: 'What It Looks Like', 'Where I Lost It', 'Contact Info', and 'Reward'.
hint: Flyers need clear sections.

scenario: The recipe math is wrong.
user_instruction: The AI missed one ingredient. Rewrite to check ALL items.
gold_prompt: Double this recipe. Calculate 2x for every single item: 1 egg, 2 cups flour.
common_mistakes: Repeating the prompt without fixing it
hint: Make sure it doubles everything.

scenario: The math answer looks wrong.
user_instruction: Ask the AI to show its work step-by-step.
gold_prompt: Solve 2x + 4 = 10. Show your work step-by-step so I can follow.
hint: Asking for steps helps catch errors.

scenario: You're checking birth years.
user_instruction: What if the year is in the future? Add a rule for that.
gold_prompt: Calculate age from a birth year. If the year is in the future (like 2050), say 'That year hasn't happened yet!'
common_mistakes: Not saying what to do with bad dates
Assuming the AI will catch it
hint: Tell it what to do with weird inputs.

scenario: The haiku has too many syllables.
user_instruction: Fix the prompt to make the AI count syllables.
gold_prompt: Write a haiku about rain. It must be exactly 5, 7, 5 syllables. Write the count next to each line.
common_mistakes: Asking for a haiku again without checking
Not asking the AI to count
hint: Make the AI prove the count.

scenario: You're splitting a bill with friends.
user_instruction: There's a leftover penny. Say who pays it.
gold_prompt: Split $100 among 3 friends. Give the extra penny to the first person so it adds up to exactly $100.00.
common_mistakes: Not saying who pays the extra
hint: Tell it how to handle leftovers.

scenario: The description is too boring.
user_instruction: Ask for specific details like color and material.
gold_prompt: Write a product description for running shoes. Mention the mesh material, bright colors, and that they're great for runners.
hint: Give the AI specific details to work with.

scenario: The flight arrival time is wrong.
user_instruction: The AI forgot the time zone. Tell it the time difference.
gold_prompt: Calculate landing time in London for a flight from New York. Flight is 7 hours. Remember London is 5 hours ahead.
common_mistakes: Assuming the AI knows time zones
Asking for flight length instead of time
hint: Time zones change the clock.

scenario: You need a username.
user_instruction: 'Sam' is taken. Ask for 3 other options.
gold_prompt: Create a username from 'Sam'. Since 'Sam' is taken, give me 3 variations with numbers (like Sam_99).
common_mistakes: Not planning for it to be taken
Not saying how to change it
hint: Plan for the name to be busy.

scenario: The list sort is messed up.
user_instruction: It sorted by capital letters. Fix it to ignore uppercase.
gold_prompt: Sort this list alphabetically: Apple, banana, Cherry. Ignore capitals (treat 'b' and 'B' the same).
common_mistakes: Not seeing the capital letter issue
hint: Computers treat 'A' and 'a' differently.

scenario: You asked for outfit advice.
user_instruction: The AI guessed. Add the weather details.
gold_prompt: It's 45 degrees and windy. Should I wear a jacket? Tell me why.
hint: The AI can't feel cold—tell it the temp!

scenario: You need a history report.
user_instruction: Ask the AI to double-check the dates.
gold_prompt: Write about Abraham Lincoln. List and verify his birth date, death date, and when he was president.
common_mistakes: Not saying which facts to verify
Not asking for a list of dates
hint: History has lots of dates—check them.

scenario: You want a weather prediction.
user_instruction: Ask for past data and chances, not a magic guess.
gold_prompt: Check past weather for Seattle in June. Give me the chance of rain based on history, not a guess.
common_mistakes: Asking for a specific day too far away
Thinking the AI can predict the future
hint: Weather is about chances, not certainty.

scenario: You're writing an application essay.
user_instruction: Ask the AI to grade its own work.
gold_prompt: Write an essay about why I want to volunteer. Then grade it 1-5 for being clear and interesting. Suggest one improvement.
common_mistakes: Not saying how to grade it
hint: Make the AI be your editor.

scenario: You're asking about health stuff.
user_instruction: Ask for science and mention downsides too.
gold_prompt: Is coffee good for you? Summarize the science and mention one downside.
hint: Science usually has two sides.

scenario: You need a cost estimate for a party.
user_instruction: Ask for a range (Low-High) and what's included.
gold_prompt: Estimate the cost of a birthday party. Give Low, Medium, High prices and say how many guests you assumed.
hint: Estimates are guesses without clear rules.

scenario: You're getting code help.
user_instruction: Ask the AI to check if the code works for everyone.
gold_prompt: Write HTML for a 'Submit' button. Make sure it works for screen readers (has a label).
hint: Good code works for everyone.

scenario: You need travel visa info.
user_instruction: Ask for a warning to check official websites.
gold_prompt: Do US citizens need a visa for Japan? Add a warning that rules change and I should check the official Embassy website.
common_mistakes: Trusting the AI for legal stuff
hint: Always double-check official rules.

scenario: You're explaining something to a little kid.
user_instruction: Make sure the answer is really simple.
gold_prompt: Explain why the sky is blue to a 5-year-old. Don't use big words.
common_mistakes: Assuming the AI knows the audience
hint: Make sure the answer fits the audience.

scenario: You're writing a message to convince someone.
user_instruction: Check if it focuses on what they care about.
gold_prompt: Write a message about my project. Check: Does it talk more about what's in it for them than about me? If not, fix it.
hint: Focus on the other person, not yourself.

scenario: You're quoting a poem or song.
user_instruction: Ask the AI to be word-for-word exact.
gold_prompt: Quote the first part of 'The Raven'. Make sure every word and comma is exactly right.
hint: Quotes need to be exact.
